abstract.p: Tribute to filmmaker Paul Bartel will be held on June 28 (S)

block.p: A tribute to the filmmaker Paul Bartel is to be held on Wednesday at 10:30 a.m. at the Walter Reade Theater at Lincoln Center. Among those who are to take part in the event, which is open to the public, are Bob Balaban, Amanda Plummer, Jim Jarmusch, Laurence Luckinbill and Marshall Efron. Mr. Bartel, whose films include ''Eating Raoul,'' died on May 13 at 61.
